item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.dc:creator: Reikizaki77
item.description: well I really hope someone finds it....... in that arc apparantely the real form of the ml had showed up for the first time... it was quite exciting...... anyways...... thanks for your hard work and translations..
item.reply_chain: ᯓ✿ In reply to Cannibal Turtle

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.dc:creator: Cannibal Turtle
item.description: Ok found it. Yeah fanmtl seems to have a diff plane for the 8th arc. I'm not really sure what happened there but seeing as fanmtl stopped updating after the 598th chapter, I think they picked up the old version. I'm referencing from the official fanqie version you see. The old arc might've been removed by the author for some reason due to censorship or something. But tell you what, if anyone can find the old raw version for the 8th e-sports arc, I can also tl that arc as a special edition.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.dc:creator: Reikizaki77
item.description: if you can't access the site via link... search for fan mtl... it has an icon similar to a rainbow.... chapter is 303 , where it starts....
